A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's by no means a flawless film\, scenes that I don't like and some scenes that I feel Disney insisted be included are littered in places through the film. However for the first time in years a Star Wars film has been clever\, surprising\, bold in its risk taking and at the same time expertly directed and filmed. Cinematography is amazing\, despite it's problems I couldn't be happier with this film being what it is\, after the very safe movies Disney has done so far. It's a departure from the vapid cookie cutter movie format that Marvel has stormed to success with and I pray it's a departure that is here to stay.
